Package com.intowow.sdk

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ADEventListener
    this class let the APP get the ad 'impression' and 'click' event from the SDK.
    in order not memory leak,when you use this listener, the SDK will save it by WeakReference.
    BannerAD.BannerAdListener  
    CrystalExpressStreamAdapter.StreamADListener
    this listener is setting by the APP
